item.title: Use Chef's knife ssh command to run chef-client on multiple instances
item.description: Example using Chef’s knife command to run chef-client on all instances using the dev_identity.pem. knife ssh "role:*" "chef-client" -i ~/.ec2/dev_identity.pem
